TopicTitle: Need recruits for a starmade faction (Nextech Enterprises Recruiting)

Articles.Content:
> 
> Sionus is considering an alliance you say? By all means, Having the Galaxions on our side would definitely be of use to us, especially against the SWARM imo.

Agreed.

Now we need enders and starwhips approval.

- - - Updated - - -

Ive got a new member so anyone online pls keep an eye on him ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) i think hes trustworthy but maybe not.

> 
> Agreed.
> Now we need enders and starwhips approval.

> Ive got a new member so anyone online pls keep an eye on him ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) i think hes trustworthy but maybe not.

Permission granted, of course. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
This looks cool...
How good is the server?

> 
> How good is the server?

Well, it's the top-rated server on the list, has great configs IMO, and isn't laggy a great majority of the time.

The auto-restarts are irritating but that's pretty much it. They're not that common.

> 
> Well, it's the top-rated server on the list, has great configs IMO, and isn't laggy a great majority of the time.
> The auto-restarts are irritating but that's pretty much it. They're not that common.

What about the people on the server?

> 
> What about the people on the server?

They're alright. Haven't seen more than one or two deliberate trolls, and most are willing to help out.

> 
> They're alright. Haven't seen more than one or two deliberate trolls, and most are willing to help out.

I might try it.

Are there any other KSP'ers on right now?

> 
> I might try it.
> Are there any other KSP'ers on right now?

I'm online now, if you want to join.
What is Starmade? What is this about?

> 
> What is Starmade? What is this about?

[http://www.star-made.org/](http://www.star-made.org/)

This'll explain it better than I can. It's a really fun voxel-based space game ("Minecraft in Space").

EDIT:

Server shutdown/restart, takes about 5 minutes.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-01T22:01:02Z" title="07/01/2015 10:01  PM" data-short="9 yr">July 1, 2015</time> by Starwhip**

I approve allies, I would suggest talking to Vennex, he has a large/powerful faction, and me and him have become kinda friends on there. 

When you talk to him, tell him you are in Endermens' faction and want an alliance. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> I approve allies, I would suggest talking to Vennex, he has a large/powerful faction, and me and him have become kinda friends on there. 
> When you talk to him, tell him you are in Endermens' faction and want an alliance. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

We're already allies with them I think... Kepler Mercenaries right?
servers back up, just logged on, nobody is on ;-;

> 
> We're already allies with them I think... Kepler Mercenaries right?

Oh, well then ask him if he will protect us XD
Im working on our first major ship in the faction it has 2mil shields so far,

> 
> Im working on our first major ship in the faction it has 2mil shields so far,

Oooh, sounds good. I've got a WIP at the outpost which I don't have an exact plan for yet, besides making it bigger.
Welp, it looks like we got heavily raided. RIP all of starwhips ships. \*plays taps\*

My own home base is coming along nicely.

![b0wZ3fD.png](http://i.imgur.com/b0wZ3fD.png)

By the way, anyone need any 1.5 million purple rock? Or 50000+ of any kind of carved asteroid rock (except larimar)?

> 
> Welp, it looks like we got heavily raided. RIP all of starwhips ships. \*plays taps\*

High alert you all.

We say goodbye to the NXE-AUS *Kalzoria Star*, she brought down two Alpha pirate stations and many pirate ships. To the AUS-2 *Kiternyae*, she picked up many a new member. And the AUS-1 Autominer... well, it was ugly anyways. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

To WAR!

EDIT:

Oh and also the NXE-AUS OBJ02. Highly experimental test destroyer.

For anyone wondering it was the outpost that got raided, not the main base. Enders and I might take a break for a while. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-03T13:27:49Z" title="07/03/2015 01:27  PM" data-short="9 yr">July 3, 2015</time> by Starwhip**
Is there anyway to disable general chat and make it invisible? I have a severe allergy to stupidity and the general chat makes it flare up.
Were the ships docked?!?!?! how did they destroy them? how did they find our outpost!?

> 
> Probably one of those games that technically lets you play for free, but if you want to get anywhere above "Level 5" you need to keep shelling out cash. Hopefully I'm wrong about that, but... generally anything that's Free to Play quickly devolves into Pay to Win.

Nope, it's very alpha still, so you can buy it cheap, but the free demo is exactly as the one you buy.

Of course that will change at some point in time, but not at the moment.

Greets,

Jan

Woah, I didn't know there was a ksp starmade group.

I may have to come check that server out once my fallout binge ends. 

[I](http://starmadedock.net/content/gannet.2475/) [really like](http://starmadedock.net/content/heavy-manta.2724/) [building](http://starmadedock.net/content/starbase-349.2615/) [stuff](http://starmadedock.net/content/the-obsidian-star.2564/) in that game.
